channel.title: Delphi Database
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm having a problem with databases created in Delphi. Look, I created a database in Database Desktop which works. My Delphi application can fetch data and so on... But when I run the application on my dads' computer, it wont work. Even if I place the database file in the same folder and everything.
Anyone know how to make this work? Thanks in advance,

item.title: Delphi Database
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

My best guesses are:
1 You made something path related that only works on your pc
2 You have a components or program on your pc thats needed

Read full topic

item.title: Delphi Database
item.dc:creator: @Zyphik Zyphik
item.description:
@Zyphik wrote:

Hello,

I’m having a problem with databases created in Delphi.
Look,
I created a database in Database Desktop which works.
My Delphi application can fetch data and so on…
But when I run the application on my dads’ computer, it wont work.
Even if I place the database file in the same folder and everything.

Anyone know how to make this work?
Thanks in advance,
